hero.intro: Hi! I'm Neamane, passionate about building web apps.

project1.title: MenuTacos ‚Äì Digital menu for a restaurant
project1.description: Responsive digital menu for a fast-food restaurant, built with HTML, JavaScript and Tailwind CSS. Users can browse the different menu categories using a sticky header and smooth-scrolling sections, optimized for mobile so customers can view the menu and decide their order in just a few taps.

project2.title: Transport PM
project2.description: Corporate website built with WordPress for the transport and moving company Transport PM. It showcases national transport services within the Netherlands and international routes between the Netherlands, Spain, Belgium and France, as well as route sections, FAQs, customer testimonials and a contact form with direct WhatsApp access to request quotes. The design is mobile-friendly and focused on turning visits into shipment requests.

project3.title: Personal portfolio
project3.description: My main personal website built with React and Tailwind CSS. It is fully responsive, has light/dark mode and multi-language support, and showcases my best projects with smooth animations and a very clean design.

project4.title: Coleman Ediciones
project4.description: Online bookstore for the independent publisher Coleman Ediciones, developed with WordPress. It allows managing the book catalogue, author pages, online purchases and a news section, all with a clean and fully responsive design.

about.title: üë®‚Äçüíª About Me
about.description: I'm a web developer trained in the Dutch MBO-level 4 program 'Application and Media Development' (Applicatie- en mediaontwikkelaar), with a hands-on and result-driven mindset. I'm passionate about technology, enjoy learning new tools, and I'm always looking to improve my skills. I'm currently building my professional portfolio and preparing for new opportunities in the Dutch IT sector.
about.card1Text: I enjoy finding practical solutions to technical challenges.
about.card2Text: I love learning and improving my skills every day.
about.card3Text: I commit to each project to deliver the best possible outcome.

footer.description: I build modern web products: performance, clean design, and great DX.
